treatment.description: Stems erect. Leaves arching at tip, planar, 4--8 dm. Pinnae narrowly lanceolate, straight to falcate, in same plane as blade, more than 5 times longer than wide, apex acuminate-apiculate. Indusia entire or margin short-dentate.
treatment.discussion: Polystichum imbricans var. curtum occurs mostly inland in California, and occasionally in the central Sierra Nevada.
treatment.habitat: On floor of mixed evergreen forests in light shade
